name: 7.4 "One Happy Chappy In a ..." Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Rebecca called the radio show what did she say her name was?
questions.explanation:
Rapunzel.

	She started to say Rebecca but then said Rapunzel. She thought she was calling a show that dealt with romance problems, but it turned out she called the "Dr. Green Thumb" show.

questions.text: Why did Woody and Norm only play 17 holes of golf?
questions.correct: The 18th hole was the windmill and would eat their balls.
options: They got tired after the 17th hole.
Norm needed a beer and couldn't wait.
questions.explanation:
The 18th hole was the windmill and would eat their balls.

	Frasier thought they went real golfing until Norm told them why they only played 17 holes. Then he realized that they went miniature golfing.

questions.text: What did Dennis call Martin when talking to Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
The Master of the Universe.

	Rebecca said, "Dennis I sense some hostility." Dennis replied, "I could tell you stories."

questions.text: Where did Sam go in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Mexico.

	Martin had one of the bartenders in Mexico come to Cheers so Sam could go to Mexico. He wanted to get Sam away from Rebecca and this was a good way to do so.

questions.text: Who filled in for Sam while he was away?
questions.explanation:
Ramon.

	Ramon was played by Marco Hernandez. He is known for his role as Julio in "Tremors II: Aftershocks".

questions.text: In how many months would Dennis be retiring?
questions.explanation:
5.

	Dennis turned out to be Martin's father. Martin said his mother was dead.

questions.text: Who was the "Norm" type person where Sam was?
questions.explanation:
Pepe.

	Pepe was played by Fred Asparagus. He is known for his role as the bartender on "Three Amigos".

questions.text: Who pulled a gun on Sam?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Rebecca went to Mexico to get Sam back. She was afraid she'd have to marry Martin if he didn't return. She ended up apologizing to Sam for the gun and telling him it's not loaded. She then went back to Boston.

questions.text: Why did the man at the end of the bar where Sam was say that Sam liked Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
"Nice buns."

	Sam replied, "You people see things so clearly." Sam being a very shallow man only liked women based on how good they looked.

questions.text: What did Sam draw on Rebecca after she passed out from drinking too much?
questions.explanation:
a mustache.

	He said at first he wouldn't do it because he was a gentleman. Then he decided he'd never get the chance again. He drew a mustache on her, covered her with a blanket and put his sombrero on her head.
